actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 927.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to refer S. 1301, entitled "For the relief of Hoar Construction, Inc., of Birmingham, Alabama, to settle certain claims filed against the Small Business Administration" to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 1301, a bill for the relief of a certain construction company, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.

titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 1301, entitled "For the relief of Hoar Construction, Inc., of Birmingham, Alabama, to settle certain claims filed against the Small Business Administration" to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.
